name: freihandlabor gmbh
description:
We, the team of the freihandlabor, a young web agency in Zurich which stands for innovative products and successful strategy development, are your go-to partners for chatbot solutions, content management systems, event marketing solutions and much besides. Central to our strategy development are the data, our number one priority.
We boost the performance of all your marketing channels through comprehensive analyses and the use of special tools and methods aimed at optimizing your data for long-lasting success.
